title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Game-Based CBT Program for Preventing Drug Abuse

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three accurate pieces of information about the physical/mental effects of drug abuse
Through CBT-based game simulations, learners can select accurate coping strategies with over 80% accuracy in drug-temptation scenarios
Learners can plan and present community drug prevention campaigns through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
